title: Feisol Camera Support Gear Unboxing with Peter Hurley
summary: Peter Hurley unboxes and reviews a selection of Feisol photography support gear at the Headshot Crew Hideaway event, demonstrating the features of the CT-3472 tripod and its compatible accessories.

steps.action: Unboxing the Feisol CT-3472 Rapid Carbon Fiber Tripod
Unboxing the Center Column accessory for the CT-3472
Unboxing the Horizontal Adapter Kit for overhead and product photography

key_takeaways: The Feisol CT-3472 Rapid Tripod is highlighted for its lightweight carbon fiber construction and sturdiness.
Accessories like the center column and horizontal adapter kit significantly expand the tripod's versatility for different shooting angles.
High-quality manufacturing and materials ensure the gear is a long-term investment.
